column1: '''''Bulletin of the Modern Humanities Research Association'' 20''' is an issue (number 20, October [[1923]]) of the ''Bulletin of the Modern Humanities Research Association''. It includes an obituary by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] for [[Henry Bradley]], entitled 'Henry Bradley: 3 Dec., 1845-23 May, 1923' (pp.4-5).
A copy seen was bound with other issues into a single volume. Each number may have been issued in card covers.<ref>{{webcite
column4: articlename=Bulletin of the Modern Humanities Research Association. 1923
